comments.text:
Created attachment 561803
Reftest failure log

I can reproduce these consistently when running tests locally on OS X 10.6.  There are minor color differences like rgb(0,0,0)/rgb(1,1,1) or rgb(255,255,255)/rgb(254,254,254).
comments.author: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
comments.creator: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
comments.raw_text: I can reproduce these consistently when running tests locally on OS X 10.6.  There are minor color differences like rgb(0,0,0)/rgb(1,1,1) or rgb(255,255,255)/rgb(254,254,254).

Many of the tests failing for me permanently have now been marked as fails-if(Android&&layersOpenGL).  This might be an indication that having OpenGL layers turned on might be an important factor here.

I will attach a patch that I'm maintaining locally to mark the tests which fail this way as 'fails'.
comments.author: ehsan.akhgari@gmail.com
comments.text:
Many of the tests failing for me permanently have now been marked as fails-if(Android&&layersOpenGL).  This might be an indication that having OpenGL layers turned on might be an important factor here.
